entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crypto support in wasi-wasm runtime #99126
  • Inspect ASM helpers for JCC Erratum #99125
    Future
  • DateTime format issue with Alpine 3.19 #99127
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 3 Regressions on 2/27/2024 9:28:58 PM #99124
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Perf_BinaryIntegerTensorPrimitives #99123
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 2/25/2024 4:37:10 PM #99122
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 2/23/2024 10:12:07 PM #99121
  • unsigned right shift operator(>>>) cannot apply to two dynamic objects #99102
  • Test failure: Interop/Swift/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling/SwiftErrorHandling.cmd #99090
    9.0.0

Closed

  • `do-jit-call.wasm` binary in `wasm/runtime` #81691
    9.0.0
  • malloc error during `dotnet restore`on MacOs #99056
    9.0.0
  • ilc compilation failure: Invalid IL or CLR metadata #99047
  • Incorrect CFI unwinding information in ARM64 assembly helpers #98738
    9.0.0
  • Profiler test `profiler\multiple\multiple\multiple.cmd` failing #99091
  • Linker doesn't use correct TypeDefinition to determine if a method is needed as an override of an interface method #98255
  • .NET 8 is not as lazy as .NET 7 when checking JSON-serializability #99089
  • Microsoft.VisualBasic.Collection has different interfaces on ref assembly and implementation assembly. #99088
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.UnitTests.GeneratorTests failing with OutOfMemoryException on net7.0-windows-Release-x86-CoreCLR_checked-Windows.10.Amd64.Open #71962
    Future
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/EHPatternTests/EHPatternTests.cmd #98909
  • profiler\\multiple\\multiple\\multiple.cmd failing on windows arm64 #98817
    9.0.0
  • SslProtocols.Tls13: TLS Handshake Header Lists TLS 1.0 #99071

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Support loading Swift self register from SwiftSelf struct #99132
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize casts from constant byrefs #99130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable the new exception handling #99129
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Make the dedup mode output deterministic. #99128
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Add missing GT_SWIFT_ERROR case to GenTree:TryGetUse #99120
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove most fgGetPredForBlock calls #99118
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Intrinsify SpanHelpers Clear/Fill #99115
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove IDE0060 suppressions #99113
    area-System.Memory
  • Reuse x86 GC and unwinding code in NativeAOT #99109
    arch-x86, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Block things needing align8 from preinitializing #99104
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove old fgRemoveRefPred #99099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Batched write barrier for byrefs #99096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not compare Span<T> with 'default' #99095
    area-Meta
  • Fix JitDump for missing string #99094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Liveness and UpperVector Save/Restore #99093
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cleanup comments and ifdefs around this_OFFSET_FLAG #99092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Suppress instances of cs/leap-year/unsafe-date-construction-from-two-elements #99086
    area-System.DateTime
  • JIT: Deduplicate CodeGen::genJumpTable #99110
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Avoid reading entire details CSV file into memory #99116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce tolerances for floating point types in TP tests. #99023
    area-System.Numerics, 9.0.0
  • Fix unwinding in some of the ARM64 helpers #99103
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix unhandled exception when dependency is missing #99117
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Mark Vector.IsSupported as intrinsic #99013
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix conflicting TADDR definition #98925
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add analyzer support for feature checks #94944
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix asserts and GC holes with `Unsafe.Subtract/ByteOffset` #99019
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_CE,CF #98409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix typo in TryExpandTypeEquality #99101
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Add interface implementing type to OverrideInformation and use where it makes sense #98274
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Add successor edge iterators; remove old fgReplacePred #99097
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Move edge likelihood initialization to fgLinkBasicBlocks #99100
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_BH_3A,3B,3B_A #98764
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Disable MsQuicTests.CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates test #99108
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable STJ SG unit tests on x86 hardware. #99078
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add GJ_3A to AV_3A, BB_2A and BC_1A #99062
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix profiler evacuation loop logic #99075
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add some missing opcodes for cfold #99055
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Disable IPV6 cases of QuicConnectionTests.TestConnect on non-ipv6 systems #98999
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Add some metrics for widening IVs #99051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix missing relocations in NativeAOT x86 output #98740
    arch-x86, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix handling of x86 managed calling convention for hidden parameters #98926
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: start checking sum of successor likelihoods #99024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update CI Know issue template to point to helper page and update docs #99077
    area-Infrastructure
  • Copy the NativeAOT AllocateTypeAssociatedMemory to Mono #99072
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Fix regression in jiterpreter trace generation #99083
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_BX_2A` and `SVE_BY_2A` #99087
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • CoreCLR NativeAOT - ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ARM64-SVE: Implement IF_SVE_BV_2A #99049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Implement Swift's physical lowering pass for NativeAOT #98831
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix exception callstack showing incorrect line number #98953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Handle MakeGeneric APIs in dataflow #99037
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Add basic ref struct support for generic parameter #99081
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][aot] Add a 'compile-in-child' AOT argument #98866
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Convert small atomic fallbacks to managed #99011
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Strip unused generic type context for VASigCookie #99026
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Rewrite math jit helpers to managed code #98858
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make FailFast a QCall #98908
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Initialize native layout info for small structs during type load #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Debug RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #98981
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Set the exact initial capacity of a List literal #99073
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, Future
  • [browser][MT] Add new test for multi-threading SignalR in Blazor WBT #98343
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Add ARM64 encodings for groups IF_SVE_HO,HP,HS #99058
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Enable riscv64 R2R in installer #96941
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Move out globalization code from runtime #98495
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add Read/Write Async test #98432
    area-System.Threading
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: Generalize strategy for finding addrecs #99048
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add test case for interfaces without impls for whole hierarchy #98540
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Test on CI #99042
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add TrueMask and LoadVector #98218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Add overview of runtime logging to the Book of the Runtime #98881
    documentation, area-Meta, runtime-coreclr
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, no-recent-activity, needs-author-action
  • Prevent IndexOutOfRangeException in RegexInterpreter #97916
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't opt out of VSTestUseMSBuildOutput in project file #39127
  • Performance of `dotnet format` is very bad compared to `dotnet-format` #39124
  • [NETE2ESDK] [Regression] Debug test failed on vscode with 9.0.100-preview.2.24128.5(runtime-9.0.0-preview.2.24127.9) installed. #39114

Closed

  • Running xunit tests from console using .NET 9 Preview 1 SDK elides important informantion #39103

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #39112
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38989
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Move dotnet/format to dotnet/sdk #38857
    untriaged
  • Installer to SDK merge - Phase 1 #38804
    untriaged
  • Remove the System.Drawing.Common dependency #39108
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include CodeStyle targets files even when not enforcing code style in build #38968
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test interceptors in combination with EnC #72345
  • Add an option to scope refactoring/code action only to changed files #72344
  • [Bug]: Code fix `Convert to regular constructor` generates incorrectly for class without body #72340
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: Choosing IntelliSense member for `abstract override` does not generate corresponding code snippet #72338
  • [Bug]: Suggestion `IDE0300` does not appear for arguments in primary constructor's base class constructor #72337
    Backlog
  • IDE0251 (Make member readonly) false positive when GetEnumerator() is not readonly #72335
  • EnC fails when replacing generated regex attribute string #72331
  • Roslyn Crash #72327
  • Publish a source package for the editorconfig parser #72324

Closed

  • CA2000 IDisposable.Dispose does not understand variable aliasing. #72329
  • CA1012 Abstract type should not have public constructors #72330
  • Exception from Visual Studio while coding - "Enable and ignore future errors" does not work #72339
  • [Bug]: `Extract to static readonly field` code fix does not generate required field #72334
  • CallerArgumentExpression does not work with dynamic #72328
  • `SyntaxGenerator`: cannot add an operator member declaration to an interface declaration #67019
    17.10
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34628.19 #72320

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/72220 as it appears to b… #72347
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Support parsing for `allows` constraint #72346
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Simplify IStreamingFindUsagesPresenter.StartSearch API #72343
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72342
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Explicitly use dotnet pwsh in scripts #72341
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test whether PublishData.json check works #72336
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Check PublishData.json #72333
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0028: Added simplifying collection initializer in tuple #72332
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Find usage message severity #72326
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP: Merge multiple translation actions into a single action #72325
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce signing parallelism to mitigate OOMs in official builds #72322
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix compiler vsix deployment #72321
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Bump patch version for NuGet publish purpose #72348
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include SourceLink file in CoreCompile dependency checks #72109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Change compiler server timeout #72323
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • More PRs for 17.10P2 snap #72299
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Handle OperatorDeclaration when adding a member #72276
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix 'convert to file scoped namespace' and interpolated raw strings #72297
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Address some PROTOTYPE comments #72298
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections

Updated

  • Incorporate underlying type's hierarchy into overload resolution #72155
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Convert Clasp into a source package #72237
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce symbol array allocations during CSharpSemanticModel.LookupSymbolsInternal #72153
  • Reduce allocations in lexer #72243
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement GetInterceptorMethod public API #72279
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for switch-expressions #69194
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Handle ref safety of user-defined operators #71911
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Implement module cancellation and stack probing instrumentations #71896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Disable CodeQL in unofficial builds #72302
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixed List pattern is not correctly formatted in the first arm of a switch expression #72269
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE
  • Fix line endings of semantic snippets #71731
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove UsingToolNetFrameworkReferenceAssemblies #72304
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Small optimization around ProjectState modification operations #72313
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce byte[] allocations when opening files #72214

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RequestDelegateGenerator requires the object to implement `IParsable<T>` or otherwise have a `TryParse` method. #54277
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #54275
  • Perf regression: json #54270
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #54269
  • Using Standard OIDC Authentication and CustomAuthenticationStateProvider Together Causes Error #54268

Closed

  • Duplicate template ids warning in VS #53869
    9.0-preview3
  • Blazor WASM MSAL - Usable Azure App Proxy token not available to Blazor Server when consenting to multiple resources #52495
  • Blazor Component (using RenderMode Interactive Server) - Incorrect Behavior on Navigating between pages, Component is not re-created #54263
  • Perf improvement: updates #54229
  • Perf regression: json #54252
  • [API Proposal]: SignOut overloads that take only one authentication scheme #49391
    .NET 9 Planning
  • ClickOnce generates unnessesary and breaking staticwebassets.runtime.json file #53027
  • AddIdentityCookies() should allow for chaining additional AuthenticationBuilders so it is consistent with other providers. #52795
  • Add IdentityToken property to Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authentication.OAuth.OAuthTokenResponse #53765
  • ASP.NET Core 8.0 does not send CORS headers #54271
  • A bug?? -> .NET 8 - the page 'error' in the new Blazor Web App (WebAssembly) redirects to 404 #54238
  • Html Renderer doesn't add the commented lines so the outlook specific codes. #54260
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #54261
  • Perf regression: mapaction #54246
  • Perf regression: caching, fortunes_dapper #54262

PullRequests

Created

  • Throw if the default key is revoked #54278
    area-dataprotection
  • [release/8.0] Introduce a read-only mode for data protection keyring consumers #54266
    area-dataprotection, Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Caching: SE.Redis update and fix naming inconsistency #54239
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Fallback to `IActivator.CreateInstance<IXmlDecryptor>` when `Type.GetType` fails #54256
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't connect from MS Visual Studio to MAC #20931
  • iOS 17.4, Barometer.Default.Start hangs indefinately #20930
  • [iOS] DataTrigger fires on first Entry for no apparent reason #20927
  • [Testing, Windows] Add tests to validate DataTemplateSelector WinUI #20926
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Shadow Doesn't Work on Grid on Android #20922
  • Regression Bug. Nested ScrollView does not work in Android. Works in iOS. #20920
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Entry control CursorPosition does not update on TextChanged event [iOS Maui 8.0.7] #20911
  • StyleClass can not be cleared #20907

Closed

  • [iOS] AbsoluteLayout not rendering child elements #18956
    Backlog
  • Referencing a dynamic color in a DataTrigger does not work. #13570
    Backlog
  • [regression/8.0.0] DynamicResource not working with gradients when switching themes at runtime #18545
  • DefaultAccessible seems to have the wrong default value #17582
  • It's impossible on Android to assign 0 value to the Button CornerRadius: <Button ... CornerRadius="0" ... /> #20923
  • DataTemplateSelector on CollectionView is completely broken - templates don't match BindingContext #12988
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • CollectionView view DataTemplateSelector takes random layout when scroll on Windows #20842
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Windows: Switch shows On/OffContent text #20486
  • Can't open Picker/DatePicker Programatically with .Focus() like i used to do in Xamarin.Forms. #20913
  • [Windows] Registering new double-tap event can end up in the event firing multiple times #20903
  • Pusblish fails on Mac #20918
  • SearchBar ShowsCancelButton iOS platform-specific Bindable Property #20919
  • [Bug] Unexpected behavior when InvalidateMeasure is invoked in Android #3102
    Backlog
  • Make BindableProperty trim-compatible #4997
    Backlog
  • Migration from Xamarin to MAUI - Title bar is not coming in children pages and tabs pages #17126
  • Mohammedahmedali078@gmail.com #20910
  • it working ,but now when this is errur Gravité Code Description Projet Fichier Ligne État de la suppression Erreur NU1012 La version de la plateforme n'est pas présente pour un ou plusieurs frameworks cibles, même s'ils ont spécifié une plateforme : net8.0-ios, net8.0-maccatalyst MauiApp1 C:\Users\cc\Desktop\MauiApp1\MauiApp1\MauiApp1.csproj 1 #20593
  • Conflicting values for resource 'Files/Microsoft.Maui/Platform/Windows/Styles/WindowRootViewStyle.xbf' #20592
  • Connectivity.Current.ConnectivityChanged += Connectivity_ConnectivityChanged; event is not raised #20645
  • What should be done to make Maui WebView renders last page instead of home page of the domain when web token expires? #17065
  • Dotnet command not found MAC OS #20629

PullRequests

Created

  • [XC] Compile StaticResource when possible #20917
    area/Xaml </>
  • [X] Allow using x:Type and type literals interchangeably in certain scenarios #20915
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Docs] Update Shell inline docs #20912
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • [C] Propagate Resource changes to Background #20637
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Restore iOS/macOS SecureStorage.DefaultAccessible default value #20914
    area/essentials 🍞, migration-compatibility
  • [Windows] Fix template check for item recycle #20875
    platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, i/regression
  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update aotprofile #20901
  • Updated Development guide #20543
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [ci] Try make it faster net9 #20925
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Windows] Registering new double-tap event can end up in the event being firing more times than expected #20905
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [release/9.0.1xx-preview2] Update all dependencies #20879
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [ci] Enable 1ES PT #20728
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android, iOS, Windows] Correctly scale Button image #19834
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #20460
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Generalize HideSoftInputOnTapped on Android and iOS to support 3rd party input controls #19626
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area/keyboard
  • added Command and CommandParameter on CheckBox #20717
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-checkbox
  • Document ICanvas #20881
    area/docs 📓
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • Update Maps Project API Docs #20893
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/Maps🗺
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How does translation of comparison operators work for converted values? #33208
  • Allow referencing the outside entity in filtered include #33207
  • Raw SQL queries for unmapped types - how to define enum properties to map from strings? #33206
  • How to handle Microsoft.Data.SqlClient new AccessTokenCallback #33205
  • 无法在项目设置里关闭mac的目标框架 #33204
  • The specified deps.json [D:\MyProject\MAUI\QA\QA.Client\bin\Debug\net8.0-maccatalyst\maccatalyst-x64\QA.Client.deps.json] does not exist #33203
  • Make model validation info/errors easily visible without having to look at logs #33202
  • Cosmos: Upsert #33201
  • Exception handling in DbCommandInterceptor's ReaderExecuted method #33199
  • RelationalDbContextOptionsBuilder.CommandTimeout should accept zero as a valid value #33196

Closed

  • Generate the compiled model during build #24894
    Backlog
  • ModelBuilder tests failing on PG because of problematic set comparison #33059
    9.0.0-preview2
  • Migration Name Length Constraint for Foreign Keys and Indexes Exceeding 62 Characters are trimmed automatically #33194
  • scaffolded one-to-many property names generate with incorrect name #32981
    Backlog
  • ETag value included slash to escape quotes #33064
  • Unecessary SELECT Inside LEFT Join #33067
  • Deleting an attached entity in TPH succeeds even if it is of the wrong type #33077
  • EF Core Incorrectly Translates DateTime.UtcNow in Queries to NOW() Instead of UTC Equivalent #33195
  • A query with complex properties returns data from a wrong table #33161

PullRequests

Created

  • Add quotability to all SQL expression types #33210
  • Fix inferred mapping application on Sqlite JsonEachExpression #33209
  • 33196 command timeout allow zero #33198
    blocked

Merged

  • Add OptimizeContext MSBuild target that runs on build #33049
  • Additional test for #32911 plus a small code correction #33200
  • Fix to #33183 - Complex property causes "The multi-part identifier "xxx" could not be bound" after GroupBy + Select(x => x.First()) #33197

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix OPENJSON postprocessing with split query (#32978) #33027
    Servicing-consider
  • Allow SqlFragmentExpression to have Type/type mapping #33053
  • [release/8.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33173
  • [release/7.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33174
  • [release/6.0] Set ProducesDotNetReleaseShippingAssets property in Publishing.props #33175

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-29
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET SDK installation fails when using winget #16834

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable parallel builds across repos of VMR #18824

Merged

  • Removing native tools workarounds #18813

Updated

  • Installer updates (Merge to SDK Changeset) #17959
  • Binary tooling #18726
  • Add SdkArchiveDiff task to verify the sdk archive has all the expected files #18748
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #18795
